text:
Hi, I am Davide Ruggiero.
As a senior fullstack developer, I am familiar with wide range of programming utilities and languages.
Knowledgeable of backend and frontend development requirements.
Handles any part of the process with ease.
Collaborative team player with excellent technical abilities offering 7 years of related experience.
If you give me a chance to improve your service or business, I will fulfill my job on time and on quality.
Thanks.
